snippet.title: Spellomancer - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Spellomancer combines the brains of a word game with the brawn of a 2D action platformer. Each match takes place in the garden of a spellbook library, where you and your team attempt to harvest letters growing like crops. But beware! The opposing team is out for the best letters as well. You’ll need to fend them off with an arsenal of ridiculous weaponry and good ol’ fashioned teamwork to get the best ones.

Carry all the letters you can back to your base and conspire with your team to spell the longest, highest-scoring words in your giant spellbook. Pull the magic lever and presto! Points earned!  When the dust settles, the team with the highest score wins the round!

Wishlist SPELLOMANCER on Steam today!
